text: allah oru cantatiyai erpatuttik kontan enru avarkal colkirarkal; (avarkalin ikkarpanaiyai vittum) allah mikattuymaiyanavan; avan evvitat tevaiyumillatavan. Vanankalilullavaiyum, pumiyilullavaiyum yavum avanukke uriyan (enave avan cantati erpatuttik kontan enpatarku) unkalitam itarku enta ataramum illai; ninkal ariyatatai allahvin mitu (ivvaru poyyakak) kurukirirkala
